titleStmt.title: The exceeding abundant grace of God displayed in the conversion of William Gymer a penitent malefactor and murderer, who was executed on the Castle-Hill in Norwich, Sept. 4. 1696. Written by John Lucas minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Lucas, John, 1624 or 5-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Snowden, for Edward Giles bookseller near the Market-place,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Repentance unto life granted to a malefactor guilty of death.
Imperfect: appears to lack page of advertisement at end.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
